name: Casually Committing Tax Evasion
description:
(PLAY IN FULLSCREEN)

(PLAY IN FULLSCREEN)

(PLAY IN FULLSCREEN)

Tab to pause in browser, Esc to pause in desktop build

Casually Committing Tax Evasion is a numbers game where you play as a professionall tax evader. As you play more levels, the time you get as well as the numbers you have to manage get significantly tougher, on level 5 you only have 20 seconds! The graphics style is heavily inspired by papers please. Game's pretty unpolished but it's my first game jam so I'm pretty happy with it :D
